channel.title: Cross-Language on Tategoto Azarasi
channel.description: Recent content in Cross-Language on Tategoto Azarasi

item.title: Bridging the Gap: Flexible Relationship Management Between C++ Host and Rust WASM Plugins using EnTT
item.description: Manage EnTT entity relationships in a C++ host from Rust WebAssembly (WASM) plugins using Wasmtime, a stable C FFI, and a data-driven approach to overcome WASM boundary limitations.
